config_part.ioc_desc: Oxford Instruments Mercury heliox Helium-3 sorption refrigerator

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 57600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 2.

macro.name: HE3SORB_NAME
macro.description: Name of Helium-3 sorb channel. Defaults to 'He3Sorb'

macro.name: HE4POT_NAME
macro.description: Name of Helium-4 pot channel. Defaults to 'He4Pot'

macro.name: HEHIGH_NAME
macro.description: Name of Helium-3 pot high-temperature channel. Defaults to 'HeHigh'

macro.name: HELOW_NAME
macro.description: Name of Helium-3 pot low-temperature channel. Defaults to 'HeLow'
